name: DragGesture.Value
desc: The attributes of a drag gesture.

items.name: var location: CGPoint
items.desc: The location of the drag gesture’s current event.

items.name: var predictedEndLocation: CGPoint
items.desc: A prediction, based on the current drag velocity, of where the final location will be if dragging stopped now.

items.name: var predictedEndTranslation: CGSize
items.desc: A prediction, based on the current drag velocity, of what the final translation will be if dragging stopped now.

items.name: var startLocation: CGPoint
items.desc: The location of the drag gesture’s first event.

items.name: var time: Date
items.desc: The time associated with the drag gesture’s current event.

items.name: var translation: CGSize
items.desc: The total translation from the start of the drag gesture to the current event of the drag gesture.

items.name: static func == (DragGesture.Value, DragGesture.Value) -> Bool
items.desc: Returns a Boolean value indicating whether two values are equal.
